meanings.definition: An instrument for measuring blood pressure.
meanings.sent1: The nurse used the sphygmomanometer to check my blood pressure.
meanings.sent2: The doctor always carries a sphygmomanometer in his medical bag.
meanings.sent3: When the sphygmomanometer beeped, it sounded like a tiny robot.
meanings.sent4: Her calm demeanor was like a sphygmomanometer, always measuring the room's tension.
meanings.sent5: The sphygmomanometer's display showed my blood pressure rising like a storm approaching.

meanings.definition: A device used to monitor blood pressure levels.
meanings.sent1: My grandfather's sphygmomanometer beeps softly when he checks his blood pressure.
meanings.sent2: The new model of the sphygmomanometer is compact and easy to use.
meanings.sent3: The sphygmomanometer seemed to have a mind of its own, beeping randomly.
meanings.sent4: Her watchful eyes were like a sphygmomanometer, always keeping track of the situation.
meanings.sent5: The sphygmomanometer's cuff felt like a gentle hug around my arm during the check-up.
